thread.title: Do You Think Adam Schefter Calls Himself When He’s On Live TV?
thread.title_full: Do You Think Adam Schefter Calls Himself When He’s On Live TV?

author: El Presidente
title: Do You Think Adam Schefter Calls Himself When He’s On Live TV?
text:
Do You Think Adam Schefter Calls Himself When He’s On Live TV? El Presidente | Email 
Put some mustard on that hot dog. I mean this is laying it on a bit thick don’t you think? Like I get it’s day 1 of NFL free agency, but give me a break with the pirouette Schefty. That screams “There is nobody actually on the other line, but I want everybody to know how important I am.” I’m seeing right through it. Hard …. 
PS – If was on this panel I’d want to punch Schefty right in his smug face. El Presidente |
